get.description: Gets the predictions for an application version.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The application ID.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The application version ID.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query to predict.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Indicates whether to get extra metadata for the entities predictions or not.

parameters.name: show-all-intents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return all the intents in the response or just the top intent.

parameters.name: log
parameters.description: Indicates whether to log the endpoint query or not.

200.description: The prediction for the supplied query.

post.description: Gets the predictions for an application version.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The application ID.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The application version ID.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Indicates whether to get extra metadata for the entities predictions or not.

parameters.name: show-all-intents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return all the intents in the response or just the top intent.

parameters.name: log
parameters.description: Indicates whether to log the endpoint query or not.

parameters.name: predictionRequest
parameters.description: The prediction request parameters.

200.description: The prediction for the supplied query.

get.description: Gets the predictions for an application slot.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The application ID.

parameters.name: slotName
parameters.description: The application slot name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query to predict.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Indicates whether to get extra metadata for the entities predictions or not.

parameters.name: show-all-intents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return all the intents in the response or just the top intent.

parameters.name: log
parameters.description: Indicates whether to log the endpoint query or not.

200.description: The prediction for the supplied query.

post.description: Gets the predictions for an application slot.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The application ID.

parameters.name: slotName
parameters.description: The application slot name.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Indicates whether to get extra metadata for the entities predictions or not.

parameters.name: show-all-intents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return all the intents in the response or just the top intent.

parameters.name: log
parameters.description: Indicates whether to log the endpoint query or not.

parameters.name: predictionRequest
parameters.description: The prediction request parameters.

200.description: The prediction for the supplied query.

query.description: The query used in the prediction.

prediction.description: The prediction of the requested query.

Prediction.description: Represents the prediction of a query.

alteredQuery.description: The query after spell checking. Only set if spell check was enabled and a spelling mistake was found.

topIntent.description: The name of the top scoring intent.

intents.description: A dictionary representing the intents that fired.

entities.description: A dictionary representing the entities that fired.

sentiment.description: The result of the sentiment analysis.

score.description: The score of the fired intent.

childApp.description: The prediction of the dispatched application.

Sentiment.description: The result of the sentiment analysis.

label.description: The label of the sentiment analysis result.

score.description: The sentiment score of the query.

ErrorBody.description: Represents the definition of the error that occurred.

options.description: The custom options defined for this request.

externalEntities.description: The externally predicted entities for this request.

dynamicLists.description: The dynamically created list entities for this request.

PredictionRequestOptions.description: The custom options for the prediction request.

datetimeReference.description: The reference DateTime used for predicting datetime entities.

preferExternalEntities.description: Whether to make the external entities resolution override the predictions if an overlap occurs.

ExternalEntity.description: Defines a user predicted entity that extends an already existing one.

entityName.description: The name of the entity to extend.

startIndex.description: The start character index of the predicted entity.

entityLength.description: The length of the predicted entity.

resolution.description: A user supplied custom resolution to return as the entity's prediction.

score.description: A user supplied score to return as the entity's prediction score.

DynamicList.description: Defines an extension for a list entity.

listEntityName.description: The name of the list entity to extend.

requestLists.description: The lists to append on the extended list entity.

RequestList.description: Defines a sub-list to append to an existing list entity.

canonicalForm.description: The canonical form of the sub-list.

synonyms.description: The synonyms of the canonical form.

Endpoint.name: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).
